parameters: \N<Love Letter>Dear Marrie, it's been a tumoltuous to the southern castle. I miss you so but I'm glad you are still in the north. Baron Normannus has set the cost of land to thirty-two crops per season down in the village of Edge. Many of the folk are protesting...
The letter trails off, blood is spattered in the corner.
\N<Letter>I've locked myself in the garrison atop the castle walls. Goblins have broken through the front and are sieging the castle. They lit the building on fire and I can barely breath.
The note ends aruptly where the edges are burned off.
